fixes.name: Delta Down All CCY 3M
fixes.dax_expression:
IF(
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "O/N" ||
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "T/N" ||
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "1 Week" ||
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "2 Week" ||
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "3 Week" ||
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "1 Month" ||
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "2 Month" ||
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "3 Month" ||
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "3M Cash" ||
    (
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Market Subtype] = "Major Curve" &&
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Risk Date # of Days] <= 91
    ),
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T USD] + 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Fix Value T],
    0
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau IF ... THEN ... ELSE to a DAX IF expression and mapped all column references to the table-qualified format. Logical OR/AND were converted to || and && respectively. String literals remain in double quotes. This is implemented as a calculated column because the expression is row-level (no aggregations or parameters).
